images.title: School Bell Vibration
images.description: Diagram showing how a school bell vibrates to produce sound waves through mechanical vibration and air compression

images.title: Compression and Refraction
images.description: Illustration showing sound wave compression and refraction as it travels through different media with varying densities

images.title: Reflection of Sound
images.description: Diagram demonstrating how sound waves reflect off surfaces, creating echoes and showing the angle of reflection

images.title: Musical Instruments Vibration Chart
images.description: Chart showing vibration patterns and frequencies of different musical instruments and how they produce sound

images.title: Vibration of Rubber Band
images.description: Visual demonstration of how a rubber band vibrates when plucked, showing wave patterns and frequency changes

images.title: Vocal Cords Diagram
images.description: Detailed anatomical diagram of vocal cords showing how they vibrate to produce sound and speech
